text: Karanj assembly consncy (કારંજna વિધાનસભા બેઠક) is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Surat district. This seat came into existence after 2008 delimitation. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments, # Surat City Taluka (Part) – Surat Municipal Corporation (Part) Ward No. – 36, 46, 47, 48. ==Total Number of Voters== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- ! Election !! Polling Stations !! Male Voters !! Female Voters !! Others !! Total Voters |- | 2014 || 163 || 90198 || 64953 || 5 || 155156 |} ==Member of Legislative Assembly== *2012 - Janakbhai Kachhadiya, Bharatiya Janata Party *2017 - Pravinbhai Manjibhai Ghoghari, Bharatiya Janata Party ==Election results== ===2012=== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/Detail_Report_AC2012.pdf ==References== ==See also== List of constituencies of Gujarat Legislative Assembly Gujarat Legislative Assembly Category:Assembly constituencies of Gujarat Category:Surat
title: Karanj (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
